channel.title: Help 508 server help~!~!~!~
channel.description:
ok i downloaded a 508 client and server now. when i open the server file all i see is cmd, bin, and src.
i go to cmd i click run it says"the system cannot find the path specified.press any key to continue. . ."
and i wanna try a 508 out but it dont work.
i try to open all then it goes..."................press any key to continue"
what do i have to do to make it run??
do i have to make a path for java or somethin??
please reply!

item.title: Help 508 server help~!~!~!~
item.dc:creator: @rs2sell rs2sell
item.description:
@rs2sell wrote:

i dont have the jdk thing so ill download and ima try it[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2008, 11:26:20 am[/size][hr]ok now im at part this open run.bat or w/e but i dont know how to replace the location or something for it to look for the jdk… tell me what to do next? =]?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2008, 11:52:39 am[/size][hr]!!!
NVM THAT MESSAGE

Thanks alot man…
i didnt know what u were talkin bout and i didnt understand but
i figured it out and i understood what u ment
thanks man for your help
woooohoooo
ima play 508 clients!

----GOALS TO COMPLETE AND ARE COMPLETED----

-Get 508 Client And Server Running—COMPLETED—

-How To Remove Anti-Leech From DeltaScape Server—UNCOMPLETED—

btw i played a deltascape server and i hated it( not because its dodian or anything…im dont creticize the base it was used on or anything )
because this source i was playing on was relly hard to make money and lvl up
and i never liked it… i was gonna quit but something came over me
then i started playing it alot then i freaken loved it…now i was searching
for the source name it was used and now i found it and wanna download
and i did but it says this when i run

“DeltaScape”
…
NULL
NULL
NULL
NULL
NULL
NULL
NULL
NULL
NULL
NULL
NULL
NULL
and so on

do u think u can help me with that problem?
to remove or do something to the anti-leech?

Read full topic

item.title: Help 508 server help~!~!~!~
item.dc:creator: @TheMyth TheMyth
item.description:
@TheMyth wrote:

[quote=“outrageouscape, post:2, topic:240178”]1. find out what java you have
2. tell me
3. ill fix
4. you download
5. it works[/quote]

this is no help, and its better to teach then to just give the answer… rs2sell the reason it says cannot find path specified is it cant find your jkd version (its looking for a version you dont have) so all you have to do is find you jkd version and mod it accordingly, 1st go into my computer - system - program files - java, then you need to look for your jkd folder (i.e. jdk1.6.0_07) then open your run.cmd and your compilers and replace the jkd versions they are looking for with the 1 you are using also the all.cmd is your server compiler, thats why it just says press any key to continue :). hope this helps and you get you server up and running soon m8

Read full topic

(it isn’t hard to find out where to put it, its not a crappy oversized one)
